id name channel seasons description webpage poster
{{c.id}}
{{c.name}}
{{c.channel}}
{{c.seasons}}
{{c.description}}
{{c.webpage}}
{{c.poster}}
Seasons average: {{avg}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {Serie} from './serie' import {serieData} from'./data' import { SerieService } from './serie.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-serie', templateUrl: './serie.component.html', styleUrls: ['./serie.component.css'] }) export class SerieComponent implements OnInit { series: Array=[]; total : number = 0; season: number=0; avg:number = 0; getSeriesList(){ this.serieService.getSeries().subscribe(series=>{ this.series=series }); this.getSeasonAvg(); } getSeasonAvg(){ for (let i in this.series){ console.log(i); } this.series.forEach( serie=>this.season = this.season + serie.seasons, this.total++); this.avg = this.season/this.total; console.log(`Average ${this.avg} , Seaosn ${this.season}and total ${this.total}` ) } constructor(private serieService: SerieService) { } ngOnInit() { this.getSeriesList(); } }
